sentences.en: a dish with a strong spicy flavor
He goes for its full,delicious flavors. I go for its economy.
sentences.cn: 他欣赏它的浓郁和可口的味道。我则欣赏它的便宜。

sentences.en: Fry quickly to seal in the flavor of the meat.
sentences.cn: 快速把肉油煎一下,以保住其美味。

sentences.en: The sun-dried tomatoes give the dish a wonderfully rich flavor.
sentences.cn: 晒干的番茄使这道菜味道特别浓郁。

sentences.en: I think the flavor of fresh strawberries is out of this world.
sentences.cn: 我认为新鲜草莓的味道鲜美无比。

sentences.en: a film with an oriental flavor
a TV show with an American flavor
sentences.cn: 带有美国风情的电视节目

sentences.en: It gives our little meals an eastern flavor.
sentences.cn: 它给我们的便餐增添了一种东方风味。

sentences.en: This movie really catches the flavor of New York.
sentences.cn: 这部影片真正抓住了纽约的特色。

sentences.en: She flavored the fish with sugar and vinegar.
